instructions, in hours, minutes and seconds (hh:mm:ss) format.| | fuelForWeather | `'number'` | Additional fuel required for the flight considering weather-related factors, in kilograms.| | fuelForWeatherTimeEquivalance | `'duration'` | The time equivalance of the additional fuel required for the flight considering weather-related factors, in hours, minutes and seconds (hh:mm:ss) format.| | fuelForOperations | `'number'` | Additional fuel allocated for various operational requirements of the flight, in kilograms.| | fuelForOperationsTimeEquivalance | `'duration'` | The time equivalance of the additional fuel allocated to the various operational needs of the flight, in hours, minutes and seconds (hh:mm:ss) format.| | fuelForRotation | `'number'` | Reserved fuel amount for the return leg of the flight, in kilograms.| | totalExtraFuels | `'number'` | Total quantity of additional fuel onboard, in kilograms.| | minimumReserveFuel | `'number'` | The additional fuel loaded on the aircraft to account for potential delays or unforeseen circumstances during flight, in kilograms.| | minimumReserveFuelTimeEquivalance | `'duration'` | The time equivalance of the additional fuel loaded on the aircraft to account for potential delays or unforeseen circumstances during flight, in hours, minutes and seconds (hh:mm:ss) format.| | ballastFuel | `'number'` | The additional fuel loaded on the aircraft primarily for weight and balance purposes, in kilograms.| | ballastFuelTimeEquivalance | `'duration'` | The time equivalance of the additional fuel loaded on the aircraft primarily for weight and balance purposes, in hours, minutes and seconds (hh:mm:ss) format.| | terrainClearanceFuel | `'number'` | The additional fuel required for terrain clearance during flight operations, in kilograms.| | terrainClearanceF
